text: I ya prie neiniyat Gospod s khubav priem, i ya otgleda kato khubav kuln, i ya poveri na Zakariya. Vsyakoga, shtom Zakariya vlizashe pri neya v neinoto svetilishte, namirashe tam prepitanie. Reche: “O, Mariam, otkude imash tova?” Tya reche: “Ot Allakh e. Allakh bezmerno dava prepitanie komuto pozhelae.”
